Test Description: Verify that login returns "Error: Missing credentials" when username is not entered.
Preconditions: 1. Login function is available. 2. Password and email values are provided.
Test Steps: 1. Call login with empty or missing username and valid password and valid email format. 2. Observe the return value.

Test Description: Verify that login returns "Error: Missing credentials" when password is not entered.
Preconditions: 1. Login function is available. 2. Username and email values are provided.
Test Steps: 1. Call login with valid username and empty or missing password and valid email format. 2. Observe the return value.

Test Description: Verify that login returns "Error: Invalid email" when email format is invalid.
Preconditions: 1. Login function is available. 2. Username and password are provided.
Test Steps: 1. Call login with valid username and password and an invalid email format (e.g. no @ or no dot). 2. Observe the return value.

Test Description: Verify that login returns "Login successful" when username and password and a valid email format are entered.
Preconditions: 1. Login function is available. 2. Username and password and email in valid format (e.g. local@domain.tld) are provided.
Test Steps: 1. Call login with valid username and password and valid email format. 2. Observe the return value.

Test Description: Verify that login validates email format before allowing success.
Test Steps: 1. Call login with valid username and password and email string that does not match pattern (e.g. missing TLD). 2. Observe the return value.
Expected Results: 1. Function returns "Error: Invalid email" and does not return "Login successful".
